As others have mentioned, there is some backlight bleeding with dark scenes but it is nothing too bad.Sound is adequate but not the best. I can live with it but there is a clear quality issue with the speakers, no matter what settings. But for $250 I am just happy that the picture is perfect. The stand is very sturdy, surprisingly.

Reviews.Title: Sound can be weird
Reviews.Author: Abby Norton
Reviews.Content: Got this Black Friday 2013 for $169.99.  Great for that price.  The sound takes some adjusting.  The speakers are in the back.  We first had this TV in our basement and the sound was good because it was against the wall and it was a small room.  The TV has now replaced our main one because it died.  I had to adjust all of the furniture to get the TVs back against the wall to reflect the sound out into the room.  Originally it was in a corner and that didn't work well.  There are adjustments that can be done in the settings which help.  Someday we might pick up a soundbar to see if that helps.  The picture is good for HD.  The picture for standard def shows is really grainy and fuzzy.  If I had paid the price it is listed at now ($354) I would be unhappy and probably send it back.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Dokey man
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv on the deal of the day just before Christmas. What a great present to me. Lol

Reviews.Title: Worth the price but.....
Reviews.Author: Richard Reinsch
Reviews.Content: Very good picture, and even though only sixty cycle it doesn't present a viewing problem. The only obvious deficiency is in the sound quality. Sound is very tinny and very compressed sounding. If you watch this TV for more than an hour, you'll want an external sound system for it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Bryan B.
Reviews.Content: I was one of the lucky ones who picked one of these up during Black Friday so the price point colors this review slightly. A secondary brand like this is often a "hit or miss". It either arrives and works great or it's dead on arrival. And the DOA rate for the so called "disposable TV's" tend to be pretty high. Thankfully, mine came without any issues.Pro's:Picture is clear (if not as good as more expensive TV's). It will definitely impress anyone upgrading from an older TV. However, if you're used to the more recent models from a top brand you may notice a slight decrease in picture quality.Easy to use. There aren't very many settings so it's mostly just plug and watch. Take 10 minutes to calibrate the picture to your tastes and then sit back.3 HDMI's. As someone who only had one on his old TV this is a major upgrade and is often plenty for every day use. For example it'll fit your DVR, Blu-Ray, and sound system without a problem.Con'sPrice. When on sale it's a steal. At it's every day price it's a little high for a secondary brand at this size. If you keep your eyes out you can usually find a 50" around $400 almost all year round. So may not be worth the cost until the price drops.60 Hz. While 4k is more or less useless for the human eye, 120 Hz is not. If you like your sports you may wish to wait to find something at the 120 Hz level. Most of us are used to 60 Hz and won't find much of a problem here though. Still, beware of that.Audio connections. This TV does not have an optical audio connection (the primary method to connect budget sound systems). It has a digital coax output and the stand L/R components. Make sure if you're buying a sound bar/sound system you check what connections it supports. You can buy a converter between Optical and Coax if need be.

Reviews.Title: GREAT picture!
Reviews.Author: Dale Morrison
Reviews.Content: I love this new tv and the great price! I read other reviews before I purchased and I was expecting I could have issues with it but it is really close to PERFECT. The price was outrageously cheap for a tv this size, I have had no pixel issues like other purchasers. The only issue I can even think of mentioning is that the base is not really solid if you will be moving your tv alot to place or remove HDMI cables like my child does for gaming. It is on a pedestal stand and a purchaser may want to consider another placement for long term use. This is hardly worth mentioning considering what a great deal this was. I have had it a month and have had not a single issue at all, very happy.

Reviews.Title: Decent Unit for the price
Reviews.Author: Lord Swordley
Reviews.Content: The only problem so far is that the digital tuner (QAM) was disabled out of the box.  I had to scour the web looking for a reason and just happened to stumble onto what others that had the same problem did to remedy the problem.  It turns out there are some hidden codes => (menu then 00000) to get into a hidden menu, where you find the setting (under other settings) to turn the QAM on. Note that mine was a 40", and the code may be different for other size units.  I read another review that said the codes can be found on the companies website.

Reviews.Title: Black Friday deal
Reviews.Author: TyNick
Reviews.Content: I managed to get this for a great price on a Black Friday Lightning Deal. I actually purchased it while I was in a line for a TV at Target on Black Friday.I don't have cable so my sources of video are an Apple TV and a Mac Mini as my HTPC. Video playback looks great from either of these devices.I also have a PS3 hooked up to this TV. I don't see any blurring while playing a game but the only game I have played since I purchased the TV is GTA V.I was concerned about quality when I purchased the TV as it is not a well known brand but I have had no problems in the almost 2 months I have owned it. I will update my review if I do. The bezel is fairly thin and the TV looks very nice.I would definitely recommend this TV to anyone looking for a decent TV for watching basic shows and minor gaming on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Sweet tv for the cost
Reviews.Author: David Donaldson
Reviews.Content: I got this for my sister for Christmas and she absolutely loves it! Great picture and sound and easy to use. I can tell you that if I were to need another tv I'd get this one any day of the week and twice on Sunday. I originally purchased a 50 inch from Wal-Mart.com and it is a LED. They only had 1 in stock so I came here and found this. Wish I'd come here first! Mine is an LCD and the picture quality is noticeable. Stick to LED when you can.

Reviews.Title: Not too shabby
Reviews.Author: Joshua Samuels
Reviews.Content: I got this tv for my sons room.  It has a good picture quality but the sound is not the geeatest.  If you're looking for an inexpensive tv this will work.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: Y. Santana
Reviews.Content: Looks great. Slim frame. I've had it for 3 months and so far, everything is great. Looks like a $700 tv!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Daniel Perez
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on black friday for only $170. I didn't know too mcuh about the company but I took a chance, and for that price I couldn't ask for much more. Great picture, decent sound

Reviews.Title: Comment
Reviews.Author: Michael Alexander "mja"
Reviews.Content: So far good but should have the necessary screws to hook it up...Most tvs of this sort come with these nowadays!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT TV
Reviews.Author: Steri B. Horton
Reviews.Content: THIS IS AN EXCELLENT TV I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS BRITTIANT TV BEAUTIFUL COLOR AND SHARP PICTURE ALL A+++++++10STARS GOOD LUCK!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good price at bf, nothing wrong
Reviews.Author: darwinmorgan
Reviews.Content: Like this purchase, good tv.I don,t expect more than a tv. My whole family had a happy Christmas and new year with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Highly RECOMMENDED
Reviews.Author: Katie M Rutherford
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant at first just because I had never heard of the brand, but so glad I purchased it. It was a great deal for the money!! Beautiful picture!!

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Maxa
Reviews.Content: It's great truly HD i have my pc and ps3 hock up to it there both look great i mean just wow best think i got for black Friday.

Reviews.Title: Not bad at all.
Reviews.Author: Alvin Samara
Reviews.Content: I had never heard the name Seiki before I had purchased this television, so I was reluctant to give it a try. Ultimately, I'm glad I made the purchase. I am not impressed by the television by any means, but I'm also not disappointed by it. The television does its job with decent quality. The only thing that kind of put me off was the fact that it wasn't able to render the full 1080P from my Playstation 3. Instead, it shows up as 720P. Anyway, it was worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Dustin A Maroney
Reviews.Content: Works just as expected. I have had it for several weeks now and have not had any issues at all.

Reviews.Title: Seiki 46" LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: It was received on time. Would I recommend? Yes. The price was very good. I had not heard of Seiki. The picture is crisp, you just have to adjust it to your preference.  The only bad thing is that I can't get it to sinc with my DirecTv remote, therefor when I want to turn the volume up/down I have to use the Seiki TV remote. Would I recommend? Yes

Reviews.Title: Great Basic TV
Reviews.Author: Chase
Reviews.Content: This TV looks great. It doesn't have all the bells and whistles of the name brand TV's, but for someone like me who is running XBMC (external media center) through a Yamaha Receiver, this TV is great. I bought it on sale from Amazon for 339 dollars. Great deal at that price.

Reviews.Title: Very good television for the price
Reviews.Author: wvcadle
Reviews.Content: I bought this television on Black Friday for my daughter.  It had, by far, the most inputs and most features for the price.  Great picture.  The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the sound is tinny.  But that in no way decreases the value of the television for the price of $159.

Reviews.Title: great Tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Steven P. Dumond
Reviews.Content: My Tv arrived on time right to my front door , the price was right . The picture is great even close up and the sound is pretty good . I added a 40w sound bar made by the Seiki and now the sound is great . Easy to put together and set up too . I would recommend this TV to my friends .

Reviews.Title: No problems at all and works great
Reviews.Author: barb price
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv about 3 months ago. I was able to have the "personal delivery" option. So someone brought it to my house, opened it and set it up. When I came home it was all done. Never had an issue so far. I think its just fine! I do plan to mount it on the wall, so I'm sure that will be fun, but as for the TV I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Better Value
Reviews.Author: Joshua Abney
Reviews.Content: I was woried about picture quality and refresh rate problems, however I am extremely pleased. It looks just as good as our 60" samsung! great product, strongly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Good quality tv
Reviews.Author: erica merecka
Reviews.Content: A great tv for the price. Picture is clear. Sound quality could use some improving but still good. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a nice sized tv for a decent price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had no issues to date with this TV, it was purchased as part of black friday deal for $229.  The color is great and the sound is wonderful.  I was worried about the sound because of some other reviews but I don't put it above 6, my Mom has an LG and her sound has to be at 25.  Both spaces are about the same.

Reviews.Title: Great TV so far
Reviews.Author: Hans Schobert
Reviews.Content: Now bad pixels, and came here early.  Looks really good watching movies or gaming.  Stand comes with it as well, you won't need a wall mount.

Reviews.Title: Made for an excellent gift.
Reviews.Author: Aori
Reviews.Content: Great price for quality. The sound was better than most budget LED TV's, was clear, loud and no distortions in several games and videos. Picture was wonderful, no issues with it.Interface is simple but it works.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT, AMAZING DEAL!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Laird
Reviews.Content: We were lucky enough to score this with a black Friday week deal.  I can't praise Amazon enough.  The price was unbeatable. PERIOD.  My husband, a letterbox-pixel snob, can't complain!  We have a smaller Sony, and honestly, I can't tell the difference.  We would not been able to afford such a large screen if not for this great deal on a really underrated product!  I read the reviews and was a bit worried, but set up was simple and so far, everything is GREAT!  Kudos, Seiki and Amazon, for bringing the big screen to the masses!  We love it!

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Robert U Owens
Reviews.Content: Very excellent TV for the price. Got on the black Friday sale. very pleased. Easy set up and use. sharp picture.

Reviews.Title: good TV good buy
Reviews.Author: Rod Baker
Reviews.Content: Its a good TV for the price. Good picture and sound.I bought to use in the living room for a few months until I could afford a better quality TV and put this one in my bedroom. This TV was worth buying for now.

Reviews.Title: 50" Seiki tv review.
Reviews.Author: robert donahue
Reviews.Content: So far so good. It hasn't been in place very long and that's why I'm hesitant to give it five stars. It also turns on slowly and flashes the brand logo for a long time. We've also experienced some vibration on the edges of the screen, though we're not sure if it's the tv or the cable.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Shea Reardon
Reviews.Content: Awesome quality for the price. Even after reading the positive reviews I was impressed with the quality of the picture

Reviews.Title: More than I expected
Reviews.Author: Alexis
Reviews.Content: Wow, great tv, especially for the price. Bought it for black Friday since it was on sale and boys was I pleasantly surprised. Has great picture! Would definitely recommend :)

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Sound quality is mediocre, but my sound system takes care of that. Overall, a really good value.  I have had no issues with pixels or weird colors etc, and set up was pretty easy, just follow the directions.

Reviews.Title: better than expected
Reviews.Author: Dominik Debowski
Reviews.Content: Great price ... good picture quality. Would purchase again for another room and recommend to friends. Can make into a smart tv easily with the products available

Reviews.Title: OK but no more
Reviews.Author: avid reader
Reviews.Content: The TV was easy to set up but the picture is not sharp as I had expected or as my other TVs

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase.
Reviews.Author: Shawn P. Markins
Reviews.Content: Picked this up during the black Friday sale, to replace a 37" 720p 6 year old TV. worth every penny :)No it's not a 120hz model, nor is it a 3D TV, and 4k resolution isn't there.. But for what it does have, it's great.It's all about expectations... If you go into this expecting a $2k-3k tv, you'll be disappointed. But, if you're expecting a good sized decent spec TV for an inexpensive cost... This one will do nicely. :)

Reviews.Title: great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Chitramanalan
Reviews.Content: Its great for the price I bought. The TV is really good and Iam happy I bought this. Thanks Amazon for the lighting deal

Reviews.Title: good picture for the price.
Reviews.Author: yi
Reviews.Content: I got it from the black Friday deal. Good LED TV with 3 HDMI input, I'm so happy about it

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Very good tv for the price. Good picture. I am  very satisfied with this purchase, I  would buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal Fast Delivery Nice Television
Reviews.Author: Ibleroy37
Reviews.Content: Thanks Amazon. I let this one slip away the first time. But the second time around I got it. I am so happy with it. It has great sound, Good view, Outstanding price. I have many new electronic hooked up to it. And I have not had a problem with it. Some people shop  for the name brand. me I shop for a bargain.  I am happy with what I got.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Justin Chapman
Reviews.Content: No problems,  if it had more ports and a higher frame rate it would be great. No real complaints though.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: Super clean clear picture, great sound and an even better price, definitely satisfied with my purchase! A great buy for anyone looking for a good t.v.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: john buck
Reviews.Content: No issues at all very pleased with the order. I would recommend this brand to any of my friends no doubt.

Reviews.Title: it's vg.
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: I think it has.everything I need. Sorry I.cant thinkof any thing to say about it.I. am done sorry i can not think.

Reviews.Title: More people should do this....!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael P Jessome
Reviews.Content: This was amazing.....the product....the service....the delivery.....everything..I would advise to anyone.....I almost got in a lineup outside Walmart on thanksgiving in the freezing cold with thousands of others for the sale there.The wife was also happy that we did it this way....through AmazonThanksMike

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Feng Gao "feng"
Reviews.Content: I have it for almost a month, so far so good. Good pics and voice and really light weight.No problem found yet.

Reviews.Title: Very good tv
Reviews.Author: Christopher Ahlers
Reviews.Content: It's an awesome tv but it does have one bad picsel lower left corner not really noticeable but there none the less except for that it has been a great picture with very good sound  can't complain great tv great price thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: I love my new TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV during black Friday week and got it for $160 and for the price I think it is awesome. Great picture, color, and sound at a very cheap price and best of all no standing in a long line.

Reviews.Title: Decent and good at a $300 and under price
Reviews.Author: Andy Liu
Reviews.Content: I think this tv works well for its price, but it is not amazing. This tv's picture quality is not exceptional and i don't know if this is worth it to be a main tv, but a side tv for rooms, this is perfect. Definitely get this TV if you are looking for a decent priced and multifeatured tv.Picture quality: 7/10Sound Quality: 6/10Tech Support: 2/10Box wrapping: 1/10 (only because my first tv broke and I needed to get a replacement)TV Build Quality: 10/10(because I did not expect the quality from a tv at this price)Setup: 5/10 (be sure to click menu and enter 0000 to get into the tv's main settings so that you can turn the dtv tuner on to watch tv)

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: DS
Reviews.Content: The picture is great and the TV's light weight (39 lbs) made it very easy to set up. We've only had it for about a month but are very pleased with our purchase. For $339, this was a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Good Television
Reviews.Author: Stan Bates
Reviews.Content: The price was right on a good television that I purchased for my vacation home...Since it will only be used part of the year I have no knowledge if it is reliable in the long run...

Reviews.Title: Seiki 46-inch TV Screen
Reviews.Author: American Express "Gadabout"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for our New Museum, we are going to show travel shows to try to raise enough money for a new roof that leaks badly, also to show Educational shows to school groups at the Museum. We have some wonderful items in the museum and this will help save it from water from the leaky roof...thank you Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Seiki 46 inch tv
Reviews.Author: doran carter
Reviews.Content: purchased as a gift - set up was easy - picture is very clear and sound is just finegreat price

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: Nice picture.  Great value.  I would but it again. I would not pay more than $300 for it though.  Slim.

Reviews.Title: So far I'm really digging it!!!
Reviews.Author: PetreC
Reviews.Content: I've only had it for about a month now but all is well... Great size, great picture quality, great sound. (Speakers are located on the back of this TV but that doesn't seem to be an issue at this moment. I've read about others who purchased a sound bar but for now I'm content with it as it is.The TV came right out of the packaging and I was able to have it up and running in less than an hour. Comes with a base stand, though I'm planning to eventually get a mount.All in all it seems like a solid purchase, I'll keep this updated as time passes!

Reviews.Title: excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Jill Santoro
Reviews.Content: I got a real deal on this tv, excellent quality picture and sound.  Such a great Christmas present to myself.  I do love it.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: sue stremel
Reviews.Content: Great picture, excellent sound, super easy set up, works with our old remote, excellent price. Extremely happy!! Was a little nervousness with the super low price but wow, we are  happy!

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous picture quality for a rock bottom price
Reviews.Author: Kelvin Hughes
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is excellent. The unit is very light and the stand is good. Plenty of inputs. The only negative is the audio out as I have to run the audio out thru the headphone jack to my audio system when using my Western Digital TV Now player. Well worth the price. Great value and service.

Reviews.Title: Grand picture
Reviews.Author: Susan Biron
Reviews.Content: The picture is fabulous!!!!  I am surprised at the clarity and sound as well. Very nice.  The size is great for my room.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: James Wells
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a daily deal for $229 and could not be happier a deal at twice the price. It looks really nice and has great sound.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price!
Reviews.Author: jean Mayer
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our daughter out of state.  The price was unbelievable!!  I read the reviews and shared some of the items that may of been of a concern (like setting up the TV) but our daughter had it in full working mode within a half of an hour and said the picture was fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: I got this tv as a lighting deal. It has performed up to my expectations, and has a good picture. I am pleased that it has three HDMI port along with other connecters that you might expect. It also has a vga with stereo plug for hooking up a computer with sound to it. Overall, I couldn't be happier with the tv. It is currently wall mounted, and looks good with the thin bezel it has.

Reviews.Title: What a steal!
Reviews.Author: Damian Rendon
Reviews.Content: So bought this TV during the Black Friday Deals Week for about $200 and was it worth it. Not only was I able to get a large screen TV on the cheap, but the picture is surprisingly great! Blacks were good, color was a little on the cool side, but that was easily corrected. TV has 3 HDMI, 1 USB (this i use to power my Chromecast). Setup was quick and easy and have had no problem so far. If looking for a TV and not wanting to spend too much Seiki might just be for you

Reviews.Title: No frills budget TV-- but is great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: This TV has been great thus far, a few weeks in and I have not noticed any lag or anything weird. Has very thin bezels, three HDMI ports, and looks great. Highly recommended if looking for a budget TV and can get it for a good price, I hope it lasts!

Reviews.Title: good but mine was defective
Reviews.Author: 2golden
Reviews.Content: the TV picture and quality is 1 out of 3 stars (if you edit the settings to your preferred picture) and way better with hdmi but mine came to me out of the box defected, it had spots on the screen that appeared blue and sometimes yellow and to top it all off it had a strip of dead pixels. i bought this tv at 340 and would recommend it to any one if their on a budget but watch out for defects....

Reviews.Title: Great Basic TV
Reviews.Author: James Judd
Reviews.Content: Our main TV was a plasma, and was worried about 60hz (vs 120, 240, etc).  I must say, there really isnt a lot of motion blur at all for being a 60 hz.  But the main reason I wanted to post this review is to mention this has a matte screen, or an anti-glare screen if you will, meaning there are not a lot of reflections in a bright room.  Also, the tv is much nice that I expected, much nicer than the small Dynex we have.  The base is quite heavy, and holds the tv well.  It is not tiltable though.Regarding pixelation:  Make sure to use HDMI cable only, and make sure you receiver is set to output at 720p and 1080i/p.  Otherwise, you may be viewing a 480i picture.  The noise-reduction is set at medium when new.  Good idea to keep it there, as it keeps the picture nice and quiet.Black levels are not the best.  Liveable, but not great.  Contrast is really good.  The picture is a bit bloomy sometimes, but doing a careful calibration really helps that.  Start by turning down the contrast a bit, but better yet, find a calibration DVD (google) and get it looking great.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant TV for a great price.
Reviews.Author: nutcracker84
Reviews.Content: I had been monitoring this TV for a few months. I saw the price fall from $399 to $329 on Black Friday. I felt I wouldn't get a better deal for a 46" TV. To my great annoyance, I check the reviews the next day and find that the 50" version of the same TV was available for $229 on the same day. Damn my preset search criteria which prevented me from finding this deal.Coming to the actual TV itself, I can't find a thing wrong with it. Great picture and decent sound. I was only getting 480 i picture initially from my TWC DVR, but a quick call to Amazon tech support (who were amazing) showed that it was a problem with my DVR settings. A quick change to the setting and now I'm watching in glorious HD. For the price, an incredible TV and it has nice clean looks as well.

Reviews.Title: This company's quality control is very lacking.
Reviews.Author: DustinM
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 40 inch model. When it arrived, I spent about an hour trying to figure out how to attach the stand. After contacting the manufacturer's support number, I was eventually informed that I was missing a cylindrical piece that should come attached to the neck of the TV. I was also informed that they had none of the replacement parts on hand and they had no idea when they'd be able to get any, but they thought it'd take at least a month. They suggested that I have amazon replace the TV, which I ended up doing. The new TV arrived quickly and wasn't missing any pieces. The stand wasn't too hard to attach, now that the screw holes actually lined up.Next I adjusted the picture settings. I can't remember everything I changed, but I did turn it off energy star mode, which according to some other reviews I've read, will greatly improve the picture.The picture quality is great, but there were a couple minor blemishes between the LCD screen and the front of the TV. They're black, about a pixel in size each, and are invisible from some viewing angles. I also can't see them from 5+ feet away from the TV. Having 1\1000000 of the picture of a TV be obscured, that I only paid $170 for, is very acceptable to me.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: B. Carlson
Reviews.Content: Tv is very nice, good color - good features.  Very happy with purchase.  Best deal found anywhere for this sized TV.  Good sound, nice having 3 HDMI ports available.  Sleep timer built in and works great.

Reviews.Title: Awsome price for a good tv !
Reviews.Author: Charles Larsen
Reviews.Content: I got this tv for black friday deal at $229!! Although i did return the first one for a minor defect Amazons customer service took care of me asap. With 2 day delivery i got my replacement tv and its perfect. after some adjustments to the back light and some color tweaking im very happy with this tv. i mounted it on my wall in the living room and paired it with a sound bar i also got on black friday. This tv is the best deal I have ever purchased :)

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV.. But came with dead pixels. Can't trust the seller.
Reviews.Author: Aleks Malakhovsky
Reviews.Content: Shipping was very slow.. Then when I finally got my package and plugged up my TV I noticed a perfect circle of dead pixels about 1cm in diameter. The TV is no doubt very high quality, especially for the price (I bought it for about $400). I love the shape, size, image quality.. No doubt a great TV, but what I am hating on is the seller. Because normally in a case like this I could request a replacement and get a free shipping label, wait a week, and get a new fully working product. They are claiming the item is out of stock and they aren't able to ship out a replacement when I clearly see it fully in stock no problem.So to people buying this.. It is a beautiful TV. Can't get any better for the price.. But the seller won't honor your time and money and ship a replacement if you get a good deal only to get a defective product. I suspect they make sales to sell off bad TVs. This is how it makes me feel.

Reviews.Title: my new tv
Reviews.Author: Lakeisha Kelley
Reviews.Content: I love my new tv and i got it for agreat price and so far no problems with it and it's slin so its easy to fit almost anywhere

Reviews.Title: Glad I purchased.
Reviews.Author: Michael Altobelli
Reviews.Content: Have had this TV for 2 weeks. It is replacing a 24" Samsung 1080p TV in my bedroom, and I am very happy with the purchase thus far.Came out of the box with a very very bright default setting and it defaulted to having a bright blue screen instead of a black screen when there is no video input, i changed both of these in the menu. It also had a single pixel stuck in a bright green color that i can only find when the screen is black.I use the TV for bluray movie watching as well as gaming from both PC over VGA and Xbox 360 over HDMI, i have also attached two android devices to it without any issues, the image looks good and so long as it continues working i don't see myself replacing it.The sound on the TV is of decent quality and i havn't felt a need to add a soundbar or stereo system to supplement/replace the audio while playing games, but if you are big on audio obviously you'd want to not stick with TV speakers.Swapping inputs takes about 4 seconds, but once an input is selected i cannot notice any input lag, or pixel response latency.

Reviews.Title: Love my new TV
Reviews.Author: Alaina
Reviews.Content: Awesome! I cant say enough good things about how happy I am with this TV. all I will say here is that I love this tv, and at this price, no one could beat it!

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong!!
Reviews.Author: Heavieth
Reviews.Content: Not a better deal on the market for the money. Crystal clear picture, plenty of options. I highly recommend. Get them while they are hot!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Keerthi Deenadayalan "Dkeerthy"
Reviews.Content: This TV truely worth the price that I paid.The colors are great and i havent find much difference with other Brands.Its Totally worth the price

Reviews.Title: Great for the money. True 1080p disable the dynamic contrast for best results
Reviews.Author: Brandon N. Wirtz "CEO BlackWaterOps"
Reviews.Content: I got this on a Black Friday Special, and figured it would be cheap but work as a spare TV. Once I turned off the dynamic contrast it had a great picture. ( I was on the standards body for Bluray, so I do have some authority on this ). I have seen better, but not at this price point. I don't like the TVs that upconvert to 120 because they are inventing frames and that is not a good experience for me. They are slightly better for 24FPS content, but most people would never notice. This looks great, is awesome for video games which is what I'm using it for, and cost a lot less than any other 50 inch I could find that was really 1920x1080

Reviews.Title: Fantastic for the money
Reviews.Author: clearanceman
Reviews.Content: I love it for $229, for over $500 I'm not sure.  I got the TCL that Sams has for $389 and it has a lot more adjustments.  For example, I can't find where to adjust the backlighting even in the service menu, the TCL lets you adjust it in the regular menu and turn on and off dynamic backlighting  The TCL is also 120mhz.  I got mine on clearance but it was easier to adjust the picture on the TCL.  For $229, this TV is a huge bargain though and I got a good one.  Some of the horror stories don't sound good, the guy with the fly leg in the screen.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a value price...
Reviews.Author: Jeff P
Reviews.Content: Great price for a great picture and good looking TV...hard to fault this basic but excellent TV.  No built in Netflix or Hulu, but if you are using it for cable TV, DVDs and/or a Roku, it's just about perfect!

Reviews.Title: Be informed
Reviews.Author: christopher jones
Reviews.Content: Be InformedPurchased this TV as a black Friday deal hoping I could hook it up to my cable company but apparently after calling the manufacturer seiki doesn't put qam receivers in there tv's so there only good for movies, streaming and video games unless you order a qam receiver. So if you want to watch cable or satellite TV you might want to consider buying another TV. But you really can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed!!!
Reviews.Author: F. Hawks
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV as a gift for a friend.  I helped her hook it up and she was thrilled.  She called the next day and said it had turned off and would not come on.  When you hit the power button, the front light would turn blue like it was coming on and then turn back to red which meant it was off.  I came over and did the usual stuff like unplugging it, disconnecting the satellite receiver, etc.  Nothing worked.  I am familiar enough with electronics to know that there will be a certain percentage defective products regardless of the product.  So I returned it to amazon for a new one.  The new one arrived promptly and I took it to her and we hooked it up.  This time though the remote would not work.  Not only would it not work, but the battery cover would not stay on because the tab was broke. So I used the side buttons to get everything set up.  I thought I could call customer service and they would send me a remote.  No big deal, just an inconvenience.  The next morning, this TV quit working the same as the last one.  I did call their customer service from work and described the problem and the rep said that it sounded like I had been sent 2 defective TV's and needed to send it back.  Boy that was a big help.I was attracted to this TV because of the great price and the generally positive reviews.  However my experience has been horrible.  I appreciate Amazon being so easy to make returns with.  This time I will be getting a refund and will be buying a different brand.  A quick google search on these TV's not powering on made me think that this is not uncommon with this brand.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Mrs. A
Reviews.Content: Absolutely no complaints. This is a great deal on a very sleek and large TV. No need to spend a ton of money, these fits all of our needs!

Reviews.Title: Dream TV
Reviews.Author: Rocky
Reviews.Content: Bought this on sale on Black Friday.This TV is great, it is bright, clear, has 3 HDMI, component, and even a VGA input.The power and other menu buttons are in the logical place on the right side.The only con is that this is not a smart TV, but who needs one of those with all the consoles, googlecast, etc that are available nowadays?

Reviews.Title: Wow....
Reviews.Author: Stevel
Reviews.Content: WOW! Snagged this at the $229 on black friday and for the price it was an ABSOLUTE STEAL! All my buddies who ask me how much I got it for are absolutely stunned by the cost/quality.  I would have paid up to $500 for this TV any day and for this price I am absolutely satisfied.  I was worried that the screen would come cracked as other reviewers have noted but was confident in Amazon's no hassle overnight replacements if I did encounter any problems.  The picture quality is GREAT but quite clearly not up to par with TVs in the $700+ range.  You should however adjust (lower) the backlight brightness using the "service menu" which can be accessed by pressing menu and then 0 four times.Remote control looks cheap but works fine, I am however using it with a Logitech Harmony 650 I go on BF as well and love the combo! Overall, I'd reccomend the TV if you can get it for under $500 although it would still be a solid purchase at the current amazon price of ~540. If your expecting Pioneer Kuro picture quality look elsewhere, for this price it CANNOT BE BEAT.Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: This is what I expected to get for the price,
Reviews.Author: christy
Reviews.Content: This is what I expected to get for the price, The only thing I dont like is the tv doesnt rotate on the base. also if you have to call customer service you will wait for a hour be prepaired to wait. There is a digital turner built in to scan for qam channels and you have to call customer service to get the turner code. besides that picture is what was expected. I did purchase the extra 5 year warranty.

Reviews.Title: Great tv, great c. service
Reviews.Author: K. Robey "kro89"
Reviews.Content: We got this tv on Black Friday so we payed half the price. Even for the original price it's a good tv. Ours came damaged (Fedex) with a fly sized obstruction to the picture and they replaced and picked it up within 4 days. Unlike some newer tv's you can see pixels if you look very closely, but from just a few feet away the picture is very clear. I can't imagine a better price for this big of a tv, and it looks BIG.

Reviews.Title: PC HDMI Connection - No Good
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture.  I have only one complaint and it is a big one since it is about the only reason that I got this tv in the first place....  This TV doesn't seem to like switching back and forth between inputs when one of them is from an HDMI cable connected to a laptop computer.  I have an HDMI out on a new laptop that I just recently purchased and have had it hooked up to my current HD TV (slightly smaller than this one) for some time now.  It has become second nature for my family members to get on the computer at the couch in the living room with the wireless keyboard and mouse.  The problem with this tv is that it wants to give me a static screen half the time when I change inputs back and forth.  I know it is not a display/driver issue with the laptop because I have 2 other HD 1080p TVs in the house and it works just fine with them.  I would say that this is really a trivial issue with most people but with me, seeing how I use this function all the time, its a big deal.  If you have a bunch of features listed for the tv and they work spuradicaly then it is like buying something that is broken.

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous picture quality
Reviews.Author: Tmac
Reviews.Content: Great, great picture quality. I honestly cannot tell the difference between this LED and the other more expensive brands. It's not as thin as I expected for an LED and the GUI is very basic and the remote cheap but am more than satisfied with the picture and sound quality. The picture is absolutely gorgeous.

Reviews.Title: Bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: Judi
Reviews.Content: Really like this TV so far. We purchased it for $339, it was the 46" Overall nice clear picture. Thin Frame, not cheap looking like an emerson or element. I have a feeling this could be a brand much like Vizio. Vizio was unheard of and then they became a good brand to sell cheap products. Seiki is EVEN cheaper. Don't be fooled with the 60hz to 120hz unless you watch sports 24/7, I don't see it has being worth the extra costs. We did not need a smart tv, we use chromecast and blu ray for internet. OVerall so far so good with our Seiki.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, don't be fooled by the non-brand name
Reviews.Author: Sadaf B
Reviews.Content: Bought this as an Amazon lightning deal. This TV definitely is worth it's retail price. Although I was a bit cautious of the brand name, I decided to take a leap of faith and buy it since it was priced so well and there were limited quantities. It was supposed to arrive at my house on Tuesday, but Amazon delivered it on Monday (yay!).Finally got to test out the TV and it's fantastic. Picture quality is very good, and I experience no noticeable motion blur even in my PS4 FPS gameplay. The sound is also very good for TV speakers. The TV has a good amount of inputs (3 HDMI, USB, Component). I was initially a bit disappointed that it doesn't have SMART features but this TV was priced so well and is nice enough that I completely forgot about that. I also have a PS4/PS3 so I can stream netflix, hulu, and youtube that way.I love the TV and wish I had bought another one as a gift. Overall 5/5 and I'm impressed. Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great for the $230 deal, just okay for a tv.
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: 1 Star for being $229.1 Star for being 50"1 Star for arriving to me by UPS without getting damaged.The sound is good, gets louder than my Vizio & Element without distortion so that was nice.The video, however, is just okay.  It gets better the further back you go, but with my Vizio and Element, I can't tell unless my face is in the screen.  With this Seiki I can be 5 feet away and start to tell a difference.  (I've tried every setting as well to fix this, I'm probably just spoiled, who knows.)Customer support sucks like everyone else says.I would not pay retail for this TV, but it was definitely worth the $230 Black Friday deal.  I was going to mount this in my living room, but decided it'll go in my bedroom and I'll mount my 47" Vizio in the living room since it seems to have the best quality image.

Reviews.Title: cheap and good quality
Reviews.Author: Ozzie
Reviews.Content: It's cheap and good quality. Friends from upstairs came down and were shocked to find that we had bought a bigger TV (40" vs 32") for a fraction of the price ($320 vs $400). This TV is amazing and I'm surprised it hasn't received more reviews.

Reviews.Title: Must buy tv for people in market for big tv.
Reviews.Author: Peyton"MVP"Manning
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing tv, for a great price(tv cost $350 at walmart)Iv wanted to upgrade from my 32 inch tv for a while, and I just browsed on walmart.com and found this tv. I never heard of seiki before but for the price I decided to take a gamble and got it and I am very happy I decided to get it.So far I'm in love with it.The picture is outstanding. Very crisp, clear and vibrant.The big surprise to me is how good the sound is. Just like the picture quality the sound is top notch and very clear. I was expecting I would need a home theater, but I don't think that is necessary.Overall this is a great tv and by far exceeded my expectations. Anyone looking to upgrade from a smaller tv like I was just get this tv! No need to spend $500-$600 dollars on a big name brand tv because this can compete with them all.

Reviews.Title: Sketchy...
Reviews.Author: Stephen Reamer
Reviews.Content: Broke after 2nd day. I tried to turn it on and blue light came on but screen was still black.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Amazon warrentee plus Manufactures warrentee.
Reviews.Author: Colleen Johnson
Reviews.Content: So far excellent product. My 2 sons also order the same TVs. One had some bad pixels and was immediately replaced by Amazon. The new TV arrived the next day...it was good for a couple of days and went fuzzy. That also was replace ASAP. It is still working. The 2 sets are working properly yet, one is going to be a Christmas gift for my daughter. I am hoping Amazon will cover that against defects a few days after Christmas. Still have a year manufactures warrantee. The reason for the five star rating is because of AMAZING AMAZON standing behind what they sell and from what I have seen on my son's sets. Can't wait til Christmas for my daughter's reaction.

Reviews.Title: ok when on sale
Reviews.Author: zeit37 "Andersha4000"
Reviews.Content: I bought the 46" for 329.00 and it looks ok. there is a one inch row of dead pixels on the lower right corner almost under the bezel so you have to be right up close to notice it. I think from the reviews that these are rejected panels from other manufactures and built as cheaply as possible. the upside is that the picture is pretty good when you adjust it in the service menu, the red is cranked. the stand is cheap but functional. the sound is not bad for a flat panel. There is some light bleeding but for the price point on sale its good. overall a good value if you get one that is not too defective.

Reviews.Title: Looks Good / Stable Base
Reviews.Author: Band Photographer
Reviews.Content: I picked one up during an Amazon Lightning Deal for $169.  The unit arrived with a hole punched in the box from shipping and while the screen didn't appear damaged, when I powered it up, the screen had several cracks so I have to return the unit.  Amazon is unable to replace it since they do now carry it now just two days latter.So while I cannot comment on the picture or sound quality, I can say that the unit is good looking with a thing gloss black bezel.  The base is heavy glass which attaches easily with four Phillips screws and has six large rubber feet.  The unit looks to be very stable.  The remote was well laid out and the controls are on the lower right side and accessible.  It would have been a great deal for the money had it not been damaged and not replaceable by Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great bargain, with no real problems
Reviews.Author: Noah Jones
Reviews.Content: Great Tv for price. has all of the outputs i need. Only complaint is that some of the warmer colors just look fuzzy on screen.

Reviews.Title: good value for your dollar
Reviews.Author: nigel burrows
Reviews.Content: doesn't have optical out but not to bad for the price also the picture is bright and vibrant for a watch alone tv its perfect

Reviews.Title: Best TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: Best TV for the price anywhere, the fact that it has only 60 Hz can be an issue but everything else functions great and the picture is more than adequate.  Great buy

Reviews.Title: Dead TV in 6 months
Reviews.Author: MR Zhang
Reviews.Content: Got this tv on Black Friday for under $200. TV suddenly shut off while watching and cannot turn on any more.Finally got response from customer service, but the shipping and repackaging cost discourage me from sending it back.Also, the Warranty center is located in the City of Industry, CA. It will be nicer if they accept local drop off to avoid the high postage cost but apparently they don't care.

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Sophie Sadie
Reviews.Content: I used very poor judgment buying an unknown brand.  The color is distorted especially darks and blacks.  The biggest problem is the sound, it is so tinny that it sounded like a cheap clock radio and actually hurt my ears.  I had to correct that by adding external speakers and now it's somewhat tolerable.  Buy a well known brand!

Reviews.Title: Decent for a piece of junk.
Reviews.Author: Cole Gruber
Reviews.Content: I ordered my tv and it all works great accept the remote doesn't work. I ordered a new remote and that still didn't fix it. I guess that's what I get for buying on amazon.

Reviews.Title: Very pool image quality.
Reviews.Author: Shuhai Fan
Reviews.Content: Obvious color block. Pool quality. Have tried different signal source and input channels. No way to overcome the pool image. I should return it earlier. I have the other two TV in my home. Never seems such bad image except one time in Mcdonald. There is a no-known brand TV also showing large color block.The one I have is a 40inch.

Reviews.Title: Bad worst horrible tv
Reviews.Author: davi
Reviews.Content: This tv should not be bought only lasted two days its not working won't turn on the customer is not happy at all

Reviews.Title: top notch
Reviews.Author: Gerardo quintero
Reviews.Content: This TV is way better than what i was expecting. The video quality is great and the size is perfect for my room.

Reviews.Title: brand  savvy? not to worry
Reviews.Author: avid shopper "cliff"
Reviews.Content: in buying a big ticket item I routinely check out the so called name brands. due to the widespread knowledge of t.v. technology I decided to checkout lesser known brands before buying a new t.v. the new one would replace a 8 year old sony cathode ray t.v. this was their last picture tube flat screen t.v. and had an excellent picture. I also have a 42" sanyo flat screen l.e.d. t.v. this t.v. has a picture comparable to any of the name brands. I compared picture quality, reviews, and price of just about everything out there. the re views for the seiki 46" t. v. were promising & the price was excellent.  I ordered this t.v. and it arrived a daily early. set up was simple & in a short time I had an excellent picture. I have looked at the display of all brands since buying this television & have not seen one that.I considered any better. my son bought his mother a sound bar{early Christmas present} and coupled with the seiki 46" t.v. and the roku 2xd streaming player we have a theater like experience.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV!
Reviews.Author: S. Thomson
Reviews.Content: This was our first flat screen TV purchase and though we had never heard of Seiki, we're glad we went with getting it (Black Friday deal, but still very reasonable compared to known brands). The picture on this TV is excellent. We didn't have to adjust a thing. The instructions are very easy to read, it's lightweight (I'm a 115lb girl and had no problem moving it myself) and the remote is basic, but quite functional. If you're looking for just a basic LCD TV (you're not into 3D stuff or whatever) this is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: For this size TV for the day and age you should get better options. However
Reviews.Author: Ty MacWalters
Reviews.Content: What the heck is up with the audio out options? For this size TV for the day and age you should get better options. However, the price is awesome for the size. Luckily I paired this with a sound system and solved the audio option.

Reviews.Title: quality in amazing
Reviews.Author: Philip Gravatt
Reviews.Content: Great TV with amazing aspects. The TVs quality on sounds and picture beat many other TVs just by the price tag. The overall settings range is the only part that could use more

Reviews.Title: Good TV when on sale.
Reviews.Author: Joe Peterson
Reviews.Content: The first tv I received didn't work but Amazon had a replacement to me the next day, good work Amazon. The second one works great. Picture is OK, but what to expect from a tv that I only paid $339.00 dollars for.  Don't buy the 46" for a smaller room because the picture gets better the farther away you are(within reason). I wouldn't pay the current asking price. Set up and controls are easy to figure out. Be creative when hooking up surround sound because the HDMI and outputs are strange

Reviews.Title: the screen had a green blob on it
Reviews.Author: Maile
Reviews.Content: it would have been a great deal except the screen was damaged and they were sold out of replacements. too bad because it was a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Poor manufacturing quality
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Slow pixel response times,severe back-light bleeding, and poor manufacturing quality.  There was a row of broken pixels on the first tv I received and the same on the second that replaced the first seiki I got.  This tv is not worth the low price.

Reviews.Title: Looks great when hooked up to blu-ray, horrible for some reason on a HDTV antenna...
Reviews.Author: Norm
Reviews.Content: Got the TV for $169 during the Black Friday sale. When it arrived, the box looked like it was dragged through a muddy floor on one side. But when I opened it up, the TV was in pristine condition, thank God. I hooked a HDTV antenna that was attached to another LCD HDTV, to the Seiki and it was very pixelated, which was odd, considering the quality was excellent on the other larger LCD. So I hooked the Seiki up to a blu-ray player and it looks beautiful! Unsure of why the picture quality was awful on the antenna on the Seiki compared to the other LCD TV.

Reviews.Title: Probably one of the best I have seen. Great price too!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Newman
Reviews.Content: The quality is excellent especially with the auto detect in the set up. I use it as a monitor for my PC. Works great.

Reviews.Title: Dead portions of screen right out of the box...
Reviews.Author: ba
Reviews.Content: Dead portions of screen right out of the box...this is just something I cannot live with. I'll buy 10% smaller and get quality :)

Reviews.Title: The highest value television that I could find on the market
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very nice television. 1080p at 50" for $500. These are the perks of living in the 21st century!This televisions value is incredible. For a few hundred more dollars, samsung will make you a similar tv. You could also spend $350 on a 40" model, if a measley 40" is all that your media deserves.

Reviews.Title: GOOD QUALITY PIC BUT SUPPORT S****
Reviews.Author: Paula Mather
Reviews.Content: Great quality for the price. But we could hookup EITHER the cable box OR the DVD, not both.Manual had a confusing picture, no instructions in words. No help with the limited hookup.Unable to get through to tech support after 3 tries and 20 minutes hold.My son-in-law with a PhD in neurology stopped by, borrowed a cable from the neighbor, and hooked up the DVD.No help from Seiki. I won't buy again.

Reviews.Title: Two Days Of Great TV
Reviews.Author: susan.bowers
Reviews.Content: Wonderful picture and sound. Two days after installing the tv it lost its ability to scan & hold the channels in its memory. hav to return it.

Reviews.Title: Replacement process slow and inefficient
Reviews.Author: Joah Chun
Reviews.Content: As of right now, I have a non-functioning TV. When I got this TV, it didn't work, but that's not the important part. I contacted Seiki in an attempt to get a new one and they went through the process with me, and all agents were very friendly and helpful. Fast forward two weeks, and I still have no TV. When I call back, they appear to be out of stock of this kind of TV in their warehouse and offer me an upgrade. Happily, I agree.Fast forward another month, and apparently the warehouse is so backed up that they can't give me any sort of estimate as to the arrival time of the TV nor its status. Their people in customer service are great, but if this is how they treat new TVs and people who are attempting to get one replaced, this almost becomes not worth it with the risk involved.Will change review when I receive new TV, depending on time frame.**UPDATE**I have received a new replacement TV, they have upgraded me to a 50" 4k UHD TV which works like a charm. So ultimately, I agree with other reviews that the customer review is pretty horridly bad, although it isn't their fault, they just really struggle with getting things out on time. However, I am very happy with the TV I now have. If you have the patience to wait out a bad TV, you'll come out of it on top.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV for the right price… Also, BUYERS BE AWARE OF AMAZON SHIPPING!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ashlee J.
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV with Black Friday price via Amazon Prime. Even though this review is solely on the TV product itself, I just wanted buyers to be aware that The TV was delivered in the box the TV came in...  No delivery box at all. Resulting with an inevitable damaged screen. Worst experience I have ever had with Amazon as the shipper. Even my local shipping office couldn't believe it wasn't packaged in a shipping box. Zero stars for shipping. Shame on you, Amazon.Anyway, onto the TV review:The TV itself was okay. I only had two problems with it:1.) The colors were bright. Almost too bright. After a couple hours messing with the settings, my retinas felt like they were burning.2.) Major motion blur that was present when hooked up to my Xbox One. Wouldn't recommend for gaming.Other than that, the picture looked decent when calibrated. It looked best when I was watching some Futurama via Netflix. Not as crisp or rich as my four year old 32 inch Samsung, but it was pretty good for the price. I probably would have kept it if Amazon didn't ship it like a moron (excuse my name calling, but seriously… who ships without a proper shipping box?)

Reviews.Title: Too good to be true!
Reviews.Author: shawn
Reviews.Content: I bought this during their black Friday sale for $229. The first TV came Monday, I mounted it to my TV stand and noticed a blob of dead pixels toward the top of the screen. It was about 4 pixels wide and 5 tall.I chatted with Amazon and they overnighted me a replacement. It came yesterday. I powered it up this time before I mounted it and it looked perfect.After getting it all mounted and watching TV for about 30 minutes, the TV picture suddenly went blurry and started overlapping.Replacement again, it should be here tomorrow.I'll update this once I get solid use out of the TV but I'm not sure how many stars I can give it after all this.

Reviews.Title: TV was defective
Reviews.Author: ParT
Reviews.Content: The TV worked for the first 2 days. In the middle of watching TV it suddenly turned off and didn't turn back on ever since.

Reviews.Title: Even at the low price, DO NOT BUY THIS TV.
Reviews.Author: Brian W.
Reviews.Content: I had purchased this TV for the great price that it was listed at, but beware! It was shipped perfectly, however, after turning on the TV I noticed a few dead pixels and the screen appeared to be dark as if it was burnt out.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Timothy M. Freeland
Reviews.Content: This TV is really nice for the money. It was the cheapest 46" I could find. I wanted something to mount on the patio so I didn't want to sped a ton of money. Got it for $349 with free shipping. Set up was simple and the picture is good. I mounted it on the patio and it looks great.

Reviews.Title: Worst picture ever!
Reviews.Author: Shatiqua Murrell
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV is horrible!  It's not even worth the $160 I paid for it. You are not getting your money's worth by buying this tv, it's total crap!  I've had box tv's that had a better picture!

Reviews.Title: Shipping issue
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Canfield
Reviews.Content: Box had a dent in the front upon arrival..looks like it did not touch the tv - holiday gift so hopeful it works.

Reviews.Title: Seiki is the boss
Reviews.Author: Dwaynerock
Reviews.Content: Who needs a Samsung are a Sony when u can get a seiki I think this tv shows u don't really need a grand name tv to enjoy a viewing this tv is a very good buy I would tell any one out that that want a good tv check out this one

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware--not the bargain it seems to be.
Reviews.Author: Menasha
Reviews.Content: A good reminder that you get what you pay for.  In this case, a  great price means no customer service, baffling setup, failure to find channels, and a lack of information to resolve these issues that wasted my day and stumped Amazon's tech support.  It's going back, to be replaced by a better brand.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Robert Scott Amen
Reviews.Content: When I set it up initially there was a vertical black line on the screen about 6 inches long.  Had to return it.

Reviews.Title: This brand should call itself Sucki
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I understand that when a tv is cheap, it may not be the best. But when a brand new tv has a worse picture than a 20 year old tv with a smaller screen, there's a big problem. The picture is horribly pixelated, even using an HDMI cable. It was easy to setup, but that's the only good thing I can say about it. Even on the normal screen setting, it is pixelated beyond belief. I would recommend getting a 20 year old tv from Goodwill before I would recommend buying this thing.

Reviews.Title: Contradictory information about Energy Guide rating.
Reviews.Author: William Bates
Reviews.Content: Sound and picture appear to be nice. I would have given it higher rating except the Energy Guide label had a different value. The TV is being shown on Amazon and other websites as having an estimated yearly cost of $12.7. My TV came with an Energy Guide value of  $18.3. That's almost a 50% increase. Unfortunately, I don't know which label is closer to being accurate.
